clustering._eps_comment: Lower eps = stricter matching, higher eps = looser matching. Range: 0.4-0.8

indexing._batch_size_comment: Lower for less GPU memory, higher for faster processing

drive._comment: Set enabled to true and provide OAuth credentials for Google Drive sharing

security._comment: Root directory for file access security. All file operations must be within this directory. Set to '~' for home directory or '/' to allow access to entire filesystem (use with caution)
